thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great facilities
thread.title_full: Great facilities - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Tlaleng M
title: Great facilities
text: Spent a night and 1.5 days in a meeting. Stayed at the hotel. All in all a great experience. I'd go back again. Great food for lunch during the meetings and tea was always available. I'd recommend the coffee shops around the vicinity of the hotel too. Met a fellow South African who now lives in London.
